subject: Christmas sale?
description_text:
Hello, I'd love to purchase your plus x pedals on Amazon, but I was
wondering if you guys are going to do a Christmas sale on Amazon soon. Any
info on that would be greatly appreciated.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ghost Jc,  We will be ending the Christmas discount soon, most likely in the near future.Â
Hi Ghost Jc,  Our Christmas activities started yesterday and will end in early January.
